name: Kotlin LSP
description: Kotlin language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence, refactoring, and analysis.
longDescription: Integrates JetBrains `kotlin-lsp` as a language server for Kotlin files (`.kt`, `.kts`). Provides code intelligence, refactoring, completions, and static analysis. Install via `brew install JetBrains/utils/kotlin-lsp` on macOS. Requires a Kotlin project with Gradle or Maven build configuration.
